From: ' (USANYS)"  
To: ' (USANYS)" 
ci 
Cc: 'nliiilY) S)"  
It 
Subject: RE: Noel/Thomas FOR Disclosure 
Date: Wed, 23 Jun 2021 21:59:37 +0000 
Attachments: 062321_Times_v_BOP_20cv833_Extension_Request_v2.docx 
(USANYS)" 
Hi all, 
The Times consented to the one-week request. I think it is likely the Court will approve it. I plan to file the attached letter, 
which includes the changes we discussed on the phone, around 6:30. Please let me know if you have any issues or 
concerns. I'll let you know as soon as the Court rules. 
Thanks, 
From: (USANYS) 
Sent: Wednesday, June 23, 2021 5:12 PM 
To: (USANYS) 
Cc: (USANYS); 
Subject: RE: Noel/Thomas FOIA Disclosure 
Hi all, 
(USANYS) 
C 
We now have a 5:45 call scheduled with the Times. Please let me know before then if there's any other info I can share 
with them. I'm attaching a draft extension request letter here for review. Please let me know if this looks okay, or if we 
need to discuss anything, 
Thanks, 
From: (USANYS) 
Sent: Wednesday, June 23, 2021 3:46 PM 
To: (USANYS) 
Cc: (USANYS); 
Subject: RE: Noel/Thomas FOIA Disclosure 
Hi all, 
(USANYS) 
C 
I just spoke with who spoke with . I can make this request, but I am not sure it will be successful. Before I 
speak to the Times about it, I need to know a little bit more info about what I can share with the Times and what is going 
on. Could someone please give me a call at ? I need to connect with the Times as soon as possible because 
we will need to put in the request today to PAE. 
Thanks, 
From: (USANYS) 
Sent: Wednesday, June 23, 2021 3:02 PM 
EFTA00022014

To: (USANYS) 
Cc: (USANYS) 
Subject: RE: Noel/Thomas FOIA Disclosure 
Hi 
Could I give you a quick call on this? 
Thanks, 
From: (USANYS) 
Sent: Wednesday, June 23, 2021 2:57 PM 
To: (USANYS) 
> 
Cc: (USANYS)>; 
Subject: Noel/Thomas FOIA Disclosure 
Hi 
(USANYS) 
(USANYS) 
We understand you had been planning to make the Noel/Thomas FOIA disclosure on Friday. We just ran this by =, 
and she'd like you to ask for a brief (1-2 week) extension to enable us to confer internally regarding the interviews, which 
were just completed, to confirm we agree they've fulfilled that requirement of their deferred prosecution agreements. 
She's going to speak with . about it as well. Is this doable? 
Thanks, 
Chief, Public Corruption Unit 
U.S. Attorney's Office 
Southern District of New York 
Desk 
Cell 
EFTA00022015
